description.originalText: Diane has watched my 2 children (7 and 9) since they were born. She is caring, kind and compassionate and everything you could need when choosing someone to care for your children. It can be scary leaving your loved ones in the care of a stranger but you can rest assured that they’re in good hands! She takes care of everyone as if they’re family and is always there when you need her! Look no further, Diane is the absolute best!

description.displayText: Diane was referred to us by one of our neighbors and ended up spending more than four years with our family. She assisted in taking care of my family with three kids, and raised the youngest from a baby to age 5. She has a special gift with children--all of my kids listened to her and loved her greatly.  She assisted with light housekeeping, pick up and drop off of kids, and getting the kids into a routine. She is extremely reliable, and thoughtful in her care of kids! Please reach out for a formal reference. She is highly recommended.
